fields.name: textJourneyCompleted
fields.fieldText:
Congratulations!

You've completed all your onboarding tasks.

fields.name: textTrailGuide
fields.fieldText:
Your Onboarding Journey

We're glad you're here!


A Trail Guide provides a New Hire with guidance, support, information, and coaching during their first 90 days. Having a Trail Guide is an important part of ramping up successfully! Trail Guides are assigned to all Full-Time Employees (FTE) by their Hiring Manager through the New Hire Wizard.


Simply click on one of the options above to view the tasks that should be completed in Week 1, Month 1, etc.

value.stringValue: Filter tasks by making a selection
